verses.text: Ha heb' winh yinhtilal winhaj Judá, aton heb' winh tik t'a stzolal: Vinhaj Fares, winhaj Hezrón, winhaj Carmi, winhaj Hur yet' winhaj Sobal.
Ha winhaj Sobal chi' smam winhaj Reaía, smam icham winhaj Jahat. Axo winhaj Jahat chi' smam winhaj Ahumai yet' winhaj Lahad. Ha yinhtilal heb' winh ix kajnaj t'a Zora.

Ha winhaj Hur sb'ab'el yune' ix Efrata yet' winhaj Caleb. Ha heb' winh yinhtilal winh ix b'ab'laj kajnaj t'a chonhab' Belén. Ay oxwanh heb' winh yuninal winh, aton winhaj Etam, winhaj Penuel yet' winhaj Ezer. Ha winhaj Etam smam winhaj Jezreel, winhaj Isma, winhaj Ibdas yet' ix Haze-lelponi. Ha winhaj Penuel chi' ix b'ab'laj kajnaj t'a chonhab' Gedor, haxo winhaj Ezer chi' ix b'ab'laj kajnaj t'a chonhab' Husa.
Axo winhaj Asur ix b'ab'laj kajnaj t'a chonhab' Tecoa, chawanh heb' ix yetb'eyum winh: Aton ix Hela yet' ix Naara.
Axo heb' winh yuninal winh yet' ix Naara chi', aton winhaj Ahusam, winhaj Hefer, winhaj Temeni yet' winhaj Ahastari.
Axo heb' winh yuninal winh yet' ix Hela chi', aton winhaj Seret, winhaj Jezoar yet' winhaj Etnán.
Axo winhaj Cos smam winhaj Anub yet' winhaj Sobeba. D'a yinhtilal winhaj Cos chi' ix cot winhaj Aharhel, yuninal winhaj Harum.
Ay jun winh skuchan Jabes, te niwan yelk'och winh t'a skal heb' sk'ab'yoc. Ha ix snun winh ix ak'an scuch Jabes, yujto ix yal ix: Te ya ix in ek' yuj jun wune' ix alji tik, xchi ix.

Ha winhaj Jabes chi', ix och winh ejmelal t'a sDiosal Israel, ix yalan winh t'ay: Tzin k'an t'ayach Mamin to tzak' a wach'k'olal t'a wib'anh, yic niwan tz'aj in macb'en, to tzach och wed'oc tzin a colanel t'a chukal, yic wach' max wab' syail, xchi winh t'a slesal chi'. Ix yak'an Dios masanil tas ix sk'an winh chi'.
Ha winhaj Quelub yuk'tac winhaj Súa, a winh smam winhaj Mehir, haxo winhaj Mehir chi', smam winhaj Estón.

Axo winhaj Estón chi' ay oxwanh yuninal winh: Aton winhaj Bet-rafa, winhaj Paseah yet' winhaj Tehina. Ha winhaj Tehina chi' ix b'ab'laj kajnaj t'a chonhab' Nahas. Ha heb' yinhtilal heb' winh oxwanh chi' ek'nac kajan t'a Reca.
Axo winhaj Cenaz ay chawanh yuninal winh: Aton winhaj Otoniel yet' winhaj Seraías. Chawanh pax heb' winh yuninal winhaj Otoniel chi', aton winhaj Hatat yet' winhaj Meonotai.

Ha winhaj Meonotai chi' smam winhaj Ofra. Axo winhaj Seraías chi' smam winhaj Joab, aton winh ix b'ab'laj kajnaj t'a ak'lic Carisim. Icha chi' sb'i jun lugar chi', yujto ata' kajan heb' anima jelan sb'oan tastac.
Axo winhaj Caleb yuninal winhaj Jefone ay oxwanh heb' winh yuninal winh: Aton winhaj Iru, winhaj Ela yet' winhaj Naam. Ha winhaj Ela chi' smam winhaj Cenaz.
Axo winhaj Jahalelel ay chanhwanh heb' winh yuninal winh: Aton winhaj Zif, winhaj Zifa, winhaj Tirías yet' winhaj Asareel.

Ha winhaj Esdras ay chanhwanh yuninal winh: Aton winhaj Jeter, winhaj Mered, winhaj Efer yet' winhaj Jalón. Ha winhaj Mered chi', ix yik'laj sb'a winh yet' ix Bitia, yisil winh sreyal Egipto. Axo yalyuninal winh yet' ix, aton ix María, winhaj Samai yet' winhaj Isba. Ha winhaj Isba chi' ix b'ab'laj kajnaj t'a chonhab' Estemoa. Axo junxo ix yetb'eyum winhaj Mered chi', aj Judá ix. Oxwanh yuninal winh yet' ix, aton winhaj Jered, winhaj Heber yet' winhaj Jecutiel. Ha winhaj Jered chi' ix b'ab'laj kajnaj t'a chonhab' Gedor, haxo winhaj Heber, ha t'a chonhab' Soco ix b'ab'laj kajnaj winh. Axo pax winhaj Jecutiel chi', ha t'a chonhab' Zanoa ix b'ab'laj kajnaj winh.

Ha winhaj Hodías ix yik'laj sb'a winh yet' ix yanab' winhaj Naham. D'a yinhtilal heb' ix cot heb' garmita, ix kajnaj heb' t'a Keila. Anheja' t'a yinhtilal winhaj Hodías chi' ix cot heb' maacateo, haxo t'a Estemoa ix kajnaj heb'.
Ha winhaj Simón chanhwanh yuninal winh: Aton winhaj Amnón, winhaj Rina, winhaj Ben-hanán yet' winhaj Tilón. Axo winhaj Isi ay chawanh yuninal winh: Aton winhaj Zohet yet' winhaj Benzohet.

Axo heb' winh yinhtilal winhaj Sela yuninal winhaj Judá, aton heb' winh tik: Vinhaj Er, winh b'ab'laj kajnajnac t'a Leca yet' winhaj Laada, winh b'ab'laj kajnajnac t'a Maresa, smam yicham heb' sch'alan k'apac lino t'a chonhab' Bet-asbea. Anhejtona' winhaj Er chi' smam winhaj Joacim yet' heb' anima kajan t'a Cozeba yet' winhaj Joás yet' winhaj Saraf. Ha winhaj Joás yet' winhaj Saraf, ix yik'laj sb'a heb' winh yet' chawanh heb' ix aj Moab. Slajwi chi' smeltzajnacxi heb' winh t'a Belén, icha chi' yaj stz'ib'chajkan t'a peka'.
Ha juntzanh heb' chi' tz'acum heb'. Ha t'a Netaim yet' t'a Gedera kajan heb', yak'nac serwil winh rey heb'.
Ha winhaj Simeón owanh heb' winh yuninal winh: Aton winhaj Nemuel, winhaj Jamín, winhaj Jarib, winhaj Zera yet' winhaj Saúl.
Ha heb' winh yinhtilal winhaj Saúl chi' t'a stzolal: Vinhaj Salum, winhaj Mibsam, winhaj Misma.
Axo heb' winh yinhtilal winhaj Misma chi', aton winhaj Hamuel, winhaj Zacur yet' winhaj Simei.

Ha heb' winh yuninal winhaj Simei chi', 16 heb' winh, wacwanh pax heb' ix yisil winh. Axo pax heb' winh sk'ab'yoc winh, malaj wal yuninal heb' winh, yuj chi' maj q'uib' sb'isul heb' winh icha yinhtilal Judá.

Ha heb' yinhtilal Simeón chi' ix kajnaj heb' t'a juntzanh lugar tik: D'a Beerseba, t'a Molada, t'a Hazar-sual, t'a Bilha, t'a Esem, t'a Tolad, t'a Betuel, t'a Horma, t'a Siclag, t'a Bet-marcabot, t'a Hazar-susim, t'a Bet-birai yet' t'a Saaraim. Ata' kajan heb' masanto yic ix och winhaj Dawid reyal.
Ayto pax oyexo schonhab' heb': Aton Etam, Aín, Rimón, Toquén yet' Asán,
yet' masanil yaldeail juntzanh chonhab' chi' masanto t'a chonhab' Baal. Aton juntzanh chonhab' chi' b'aj kajan heb' yet' yinhtilal icha yaj stz'ib'chajkani.

Ayic ix q'uib' sb'isul heb' yinhtilal Simeón chi', aton heb' winh tik yajal yaj t'a skal heb': Vinhaj Mesobab, winhaj Jamlec, winhaj Josías (yuninal winhaj Amasías), winhaj Joel, winhaj Jehú (yuninal winhaj Josibías, haxo winhaj Josibías chi' yuninal winhaj Seraías, haxo winhaj Seraías chi' yuninal winhaj Asiel) yet' pax winhaj Elioenai, winhaj Jaacoba, winhaj Jesohaía, winhaj Asaías, winhaj Adiel, winhaj Jesimiel, winhaj Benaía yet' winhaj Ziza. (Ha winh smam winhaj Ziza chi' aton winhaj Sifi, yuninal winhaj Alón, yuninal winhaj Jedaías, yuninal winhaj Simri yuninal winhaj Semaías).

Yujto ix q'uib' sb'isul heb', yuj chi' ix b'at heb' t'a stojolal b'aj tz'em k'u, ix k'och heb' t'a slak'anil chonhab' Gedor. Ix sayan heb' b'aj swa nok' smolb'etzal nok' t'a stojolal b'aj sjawi k'u, t'a jun ch'olan b'aj skan jun chonhab' chi'.

Ata' ix ilchaj anh ank'ultak te yaax yuj heb', te wach' anh, te ay pax anh. Te lewan yek' jun lum lum chi', junk'olal yajek' heb', malaj tas tz'ik'an heb', aton ta' ek'nac kajan heb' yinhtilal Cam t'a peka'.

Ha t'a stiempoal winhaj Ezequías sreyal Judá, ata' ix jawi juntzanh heb' toxo ix b'inaj sb'i tik. Ha heb' satjinaquel heb' anima kajan ta' yet' skampamento heb' yet' spat heb'. Junelnhej ix satel heb' smasanil. Axo heb' ix kajnajkan t'a slum heb' chi', yujto te ay swael nok' smolb'etzal nok' heb'.

Anhejtona', ay pax 500-xo heb' winh winak t'a yinhtilal Simeón chi' ix k'och kajan t'a lum tzalquixtac t'a yol yic Seir. Axo heb' winh yuninal winhaj Isi, aton winhaj Pelatías, winhaj Nearías, winhaj Refaías yet' winhaj Uziel ayoch yajaliloc heb'.
Ha heb' ix satanel heb' amalecita aytoek' ta'. Axo heb' ix kajnajkan ta'.
